remarks: The predicate "is a closed projective subspace".  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
psubclset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
psubclset.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
psubclset.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
ispsubclN $p |- ( K e. D -> ( X e. C <-> ( X C_ A /\ ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X ) ) ) $.
